summary: A retex of dwarven one handed sword to make it look more ancient
descriptionHtml:
v1.1: Small fix to normals map, added two color variants.

If you want to use BLACK or GOLD&BLACK color scheme instead of default all gold, go into textures\\weapons\\dwarven folder and rename
GOLDdwarvensword or GOLDBLACKdwarvensword to -->> dwarvensword.dds
Bout it.. enjoy
.............................

The original texture didn\'t grow on me so made this one.
Looks old and run down like something one would find in ancient ruins..  fits my character better and thats why i made it in first place. 
Anyways just sharing..

PS: the green there is a magic aura not the retex, but couldn\'t find a plain one in shops.. can\'t wait till CK comes sheesh :) 
PPS: Texture sizes are the same as vanilla, so should be no performance issues.
author: fLokii
